recipes.name: Chicken Broccoli Casserole
steps: Cook the chicken
Cook the broccoli
Do the hokey pokey
Turn yourself around
Serve hot chicken and broccoli over dry rice in cold cream of chicken soup. Enjoy!

recipes.name: Ice Cream Sandwich
steps: Remove Ice Cream Sandwich from freezer.
Unwrap the Ice Cream Sandwich
Unhinge jaw
[REDACTED]
Congratulations, you have probably eaten an Ice Cream Sandwich!

recipes.name: Brussels Sprouts
steps: Wash Brussels Sprouts, and prepare by cutting off the stems of and halving each sprout.
While preparing the sprouts, melt butter in a cast-iron pan over medium heat.
Place brussels sprouts in pan face down, and cook over medium heat for 9-10 minutes, flipping once light browning occurs.
Cook on the other side until sprouts are fully cooked.
Season to taste and serve!

recipes.name: Macaroni and Cheese
steps: In a pot over medium-low heat, melt butter.
Slowly, add flour to butter to create a roux.
Once roux is set up, slowly add all milk.
Add cheese to milk and simmer until desired thickness is achieved.
Cook noodles in highly salted water.
Pour sauce over noodles and serve!
